PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2010-15802010-12-09,  ,  ,  HRSDC, 
ActEmployment Insurance Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Employment Insurance Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the EMPLOYMENT INSURANCE (EI) REGULATIONS, in order to amend current Employement Insurance Regulations that govern the harmonization between the Employment Insurance and Quebec Parental Insurance Plan (QPIP) programs, as well as prescribe a revised formula for the Employment Insurance premium reduction for residents of Quebec by adding the self-employed to the formula.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2010-0301 Publication Date: 2010-12-22
AttachmentsAttachment
